org.javautil.io
Class ClassPathResourceResolver

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.core.io.DefaultResourceLoader
      org.javautil.io.ClassPathResourceResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceDirectory, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader
public class ClassPathResourceResolver
extends org.springframework.core.io.DefaultResourceLoader
implements ResourceDirectory, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

A resource directory for locating resources in the classpath. This class resolves resources like the DefaultResourceLoader class from spring, except that it allows relative file resolution to a root path. Please note that the url prefixes classpath:// and file:// should not be present in the resource names.
